title: GrapeGPT AI Wine Assistant
introduction: GrapeGPT is an AI-powered tool designed to help users select the best wine for their meal by simply taking a picture of their wine list and engaging in a conversation.
features: Take a picture of your wine list
Engage in a conversation to get wine recommendations

faqs.question: How do I use GrapeGPT?
faqs.answer: Simply take a picture of your wine list and have a conversation with GrapeGPT to get wine recommendations.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from GrapeGPT?
faqs.answer: Wine enthusiasts, diners, and restaurant-goers looking for wine recommendations.
